articles.author: By Luke May For Mailonline
articles.title: Oliver Dowden 'wouldn't have taken Little Britain off iPlayer' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Culture Secretary Oliver Dowden has told ITV's Peston he 'wouldn't be inclined' to pull Little Britain from streaming services. It came after BBC iPlayer, BritBox and Netflix dropped the show.
articles.content: Culture Secretary Oliver Dowden has said he 'wouldn't be inclined' to pull Little Britain from streaming services, after it was revealed the show had been removed by some providers for its use of cha… [+12641 chars]
